name: The Men'nai Tattoos
description:
As part of an ongoing sci-fi series (with more installments coming soon!), The Men'nai Tattoos is a Borges-inspired poem/"ethnography" about a stoic race of humanoids that lived on the moon and covered themselves with ritualistic tattoos. 

The poem is very short, but highly moody. Turn the sound on for a full dose of melancholy!
